title: CNN Architecture Visualizer
creator: Claude Code with microsim-generator skill
subject: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Convolutional Neural Networks
description: Interactive visualization showing the layer structure and data flow through different CNN architectures including Simple CNN, VGG-like, and ResNet Block.
learningObjectives: Understand the sequential structure of CNN architectures
Visualize how data dimensions change through layers
Learn the purpose of different layer types

controls.name: Architecture
controls.description: Select CNN architecture (Simple CNN, VGG-like, ResNet Block)

controls.name: Flow Speed
controls.description: Control animation speed of data flow

controls.name: Play/Pause
controls.description: Start or pause the data flow animation

architectures: Simple CNN: Input → Conv → Pool → Conv → Pool → FC → Output
VGG-like: Input → 2×Conv → Pool → Conv → Pool → 2×FC → Output
ResNet Block: Input → Conv1×1 → Conv3×3 → Conv1×1 → Add → ReLU
limitations: Does not show actual computation or weights
Does not visualize activation maps or filters
